name: Buy2Sell
description:
Buy2Sell has been founded to maximize opportunities in Vietnam, whether it is in the branding, the distribution market or any other B2B sector. We make all processes seamless by handling all digital promotion, importation & distribution processes until product registration.

Since 2015,  we supplied goods for more 120,000 Vietnamese wholesalers/retailers.

Buy2sell got a showroom and more than 200 retail locations across the country. More than 1000 international suppliers worked with Buy2sell from 2018 to 2020.

Buy2Sell is also operating in Hong Kong and Singapore.
